conversation_context.reason_for_visit: Comprehensive evaluation for academic and adaptive functioning difficulties

patient_background.living_situation: Lives with both parents and younger sister
patient_background.family_history: No known family history of intellectual disability

Cannot tell time on analog clock

Can express basic needs and wants but struggles with complex communication

thoughts: Awareness of difficulties compared to peers
Expresses desire to 'be like other kids'
feelings: Frustration when unable to complete tasks

Anxiety in novel or complex situations

Enjoys simple games and repetitive play
changes_in_routine: Receives additional support for daily living skills

Difficulties not better explained by other conditions
